column4: hi, I'm mounting ntfs partitions through udisks but I can't pass mount options of ntfs-3g, any clue? --mount-options does not recognize the ntfs-3g options such as hide_hid_files or anything
I'm not familiar with udisks, did you mean to say udev or is udisks something else?
I don't know what you mean, but I mean udisks not something else
ok, sorry. not really familiar with that.
